titleNullable: The Economics of Grid-Scale Electricity Storage
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Hourly data of electricity demand and (nodal) prices in Ontario, provided openly by IESO, the Independent Electricity System Operator of the province. This is unprocessed raw data used in my study.


### Acknowledgements

Antweiler, Werner (2021), “Data for: The Economics of Grid-Scale Electricity Storage: Location Heterogeneity and Business Models”, Mendeley Data, V1, doi: 10.17632/dvn9yg52sb.1
